attributes.action: Condemn the Church of Scientology (the organisation, not the belief)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The founder of this organisation was banned from this country, members have been convicted of crimes ranging from fraud to theft of government property in the US and France, and the organisation has been found to use policies such as "fair game" against critics and may still be using said polices. Scientology is allowed to slander individuals but we are not allowed to slander Scientology.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/scientologyban/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
